location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Inventory of the Effects of George Grey, deceased, received from Padre Joannes Isaacs at Gulfar 1 May 1777, and sold in Bushire 14 July 1777 from John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has several holes in its text.

mods.abstract: List of George Grey's belongings that were sold including details of who purchased them and how much for.
